sentences.en: ...the date when the president-elect takes office.
A conclave of cardinals was held to elect the new Pope.
sentences.cn: 红衣主教团举行了秘密会议来选举新教皇。

sentences.en: a new method for electing the leader of the party
Austrian voters went to the polls this weekend to elect a successor to the President.
sentences.cn: 奥地利选民这周末去投票中心选举下届总统。

sentences.en: Concentrators in geological sciences elect either geology or geography.
sentences.cn: 主修地质学的学生要选修地质学或地理课程.

sentences.en: Councils should be answerable to the people who elect them.
sentences.cn: 市政会成员应对推选他们的人负责。

sentences.en: Elect whom you please to be your cap'n now ; I'm done with it.'
sentences.cn: 你们爱选谁当船长就选谁吧, 我是受够了. ”

sentences.en: In the last resort a minor may elect a guardian himself.
sentences.cn: 最后一种办法是未成年人可以自己选择监护人.

sentences.en: It is the difference of the elect and the vulgar.
sentences.cn: 这是上等人与下等人之间的区别.

sentences.en: the country’s first democratically elected government
sentences.cn: 该国第一个民主选举产生的政府

sentences.en: The people of the Philippines have voted to elect a new president.
sentences.cn: 菲律宾人民已投票选举出了一位新总统。

sentences.en: The politicians tried to smear the governor's reputation in order to elect the man they chose.
sentences.cn: 政客们为了能够让他们推举的人当选而毁坏州长的名誉.

sentences.en: The President - elect had asked me to chat with Rogers and to report my reactions.
sentences.cn: 总统当选人要我与罗杰斯随便谈谈,并向他汇报我的印象.

sentences.en: The President - elect visited the Tennessee Valley in company with Norris.
sentences.cn: 在诺里斯的陪同下,这位当选总统视察了田纳西河流域.

sentences.en: The president - elect will be inaugurated in February.
sentences.cn: 总统当选人将于二月就职.

sentences.en: The President-elect followed in an open carriage drawn by six beautiful gray horses.
sentences.cn: 新当选的总统紧随其后，乘坐一辆由6匹漂亮的灰马拉着的敞篷马车。

sentences.en: Voters always elect the candidate most tuned in to their needs.
sentences.cn: 选民总是选那些最能体察其疾苦的候选人.

sentences.en: Voters are due to go to the polls on Sunday to elect a new president.
sentences.cn: 选民应于星期日前往投票站选举新总统。

sentences.en: You can elect to delete the message or save it.
sentences.cn: 你可以选择删除或者保存信息。

trans.tran_en: to choose someone for an official position by voting
